name: DetailPanel
description: Detail panels are a way to provide additional drill-down information about a specific visualization (tables, chart, map, etc.) on the current screen.

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the detail panel

props.name: description
props.default: Nulla quis tortor orci. Etiam at risus et justo dignissim.
props.description: A brief description of of the content being shown in the detail panel

props.name: children
props.description: Whatever content you place inside of the component tags

props.name: onClose
props.default: Sets detail panel to display: none in using css
props.description: A function used triggered when the close button is clicked

props.name: onMinimize
props.default: Moves detail panel out of view (to the right) using css.
props.description: A function used triggered when the minimize button is clicked
